Key Match Events: The Dodgers won 6-2 in 10 innings thanks to a 3-run home run from Mookie Betts.
Shohei Ohtani returned to Anaheim and hit an RBI triple in his first game back at Angel Stadium since signing with the Dodgers.
Five Dodgers’ relievers each threw a perfect inning to close out the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The LA Dodgers (84-55) will look to make it two in a row over the LA Angels (57-81) when teams take the field tonight in Anaheim, CA.
Predicted pitching matchup: Bo Miller vs. Griffin Canning.
Mookie Betts, Freddie Freeman, and Teoscar Hernandez have each hit home runs in their career off of Griffin Canning.
Shohei Ohtani has been a teammate of Griffin Canning but has never stepped to the plate against him.
Mookie Betts is 5-11 (.455) in August and has hit safely in 11 of his last 13 games.
Will Smith has just 5 hits in his last 24 ABs (.208) for the Dodgers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers are 39-31 away from Chavez Ravine this season with an overall run differential of +121.
The Angels are 29-42 at Angel Stadium this season with an overall run differential of -131.
